column4: need help!!!have burned a dvd with dvd baker.but now can't play the files.it says:No URI handler implemented for "burn:///Snowboard%20Halfpipe%20-%20Torino%202006%20-%20Qualification%20%26%20Finale.avi"Totem konnte burn:///Snowboard Halfpipe - Torino 2006 - Qualification & Finale.avi nicht wiedergeben.
